name: Chad Thieke
text: It's just ok pizza to me it has no flavor to me at all kinda taste like your eating the card board box the pizza came in but I may have just gotten a bad pizza that day I will give it another try later on and see how that goes then

name: Ken Wright
text:
Pizza is good, Just can't see menu online
no matter what you do

name: Marcus Binoeder
text: Incredible pizza, need one in Amelia!

name: Jp Merlo
text: This is one of the, if not THEE best restaurant in Cave City! The food is well prepared, the service is excellent, and the prices are very attractive. The signature steaks are amazing and the salad bar is very clean and always fresh!

name: Sherman Riddell
text:
Called in and ordered, pizzas were exactly as requested & tested like Godfather is supposed to (unlike the one in Glasgow).
Thanks for doing it right!!!

name: Dennis Pedigo
text: The best thing since sliced bread

name: Kevin Yauch
text: It is gas station pizza, but surprisingly good.

name: Craig Nunn
text: They will not answer their telephone.

name: Chris Brewster
text: Godfathers pizzais located inside of Minit Mart, fairly busy most of the time. They have pretty good pizza, with specials available part of the time. â€¦More

text: Our daily (evening) walk to the Marathon station in which there is a Godfathers which is awesome pizza...

text: Best salad bar and pizza around

name: William Gross
text:
Simple order, 1. Veggie grinder. 1 Roast beef grinder. Both 12 inches.
Picked up: 2 six inch veggie grinders.
Totally wrong, very disappointed.....especially when I'm hungry....

text: If you like catchup on crackers you will love this place.
